version_description:
Christmas soon! Event starts on Dec 20.
Collect the christmas gifts lost around the winter planet to redeem for exclusive items!

Also fixed an annoying bug with lagging.

Christmas soon! Event starts on Dec 20.
Collect the christmas gifts lost around the winter planet to redeem for exclusive items!

Also fixed an annoying bug with lagging.

Christmas soon! Event starts on Dec 20.
Collect the christmas gifts lost around the winter planet to redeem for exclusive items!

Also fixed an annoying bug with lagging.

Welcome the big update!

NEW INTERFACE: we have added many features in this update and have to update the interface also. Hope you like it. It will help us build new features faster in future.
NEW SOUNDS: we have spend a bunch of time making new sounds for the game. Enjoy!
NEW ROULETTE: new look and better prizes.
TROPHIES: new feature. Some cool trophies are waiting to be unlocked by rovercrafters.
BIGFOOT: a new rover pack, featuring big wheels, unlockable as a trophy.
CHALLENGES: are now divided into Tiers where you can play any challenge you choose. Also challenges now have a new planet.
NEW CHALLENGES: 20 new challenges added. Now we have 120 challenges totally.
NEWS TICKER: to highlight recent roulette jackpot winners and Titan's best players.
UPDATED JET: you can now detach Jet clicking it's button again.

Also we have migrated to a new game engine and there were big changes in physics engine. We did our best to make the physics behaviour the same as before but there might be some little differences.

NEW INTERFACE: we have added many features in this update and have to update the interface also. Hope you like it. It will help us build new features faster in future.

NEW CHALLENGES: 20 new challenges added. Now we have 140 challenges totally.

Bug fixes:
- Fragile rover parts
- Challenge attempts not being restored
- Turbine self-activation
- Malfunction in some trophy tasks
- Some minor bugs also

Small bug fix.
Small bug fix.
Small bug fix.

NEW PLANETS: Comet and Enceladus.

Added a restriction to use turbines and jet on Enceladus because we feel that those part make it too easy to pass some type of planets.
We may use such restrictions on later planets too.

Italian localisations is now available.

We may use such restrictions on later planets too.

NEW PLANETS: Comet and Enceladus.

Added a restriction to use turbines and jet on Enceladus because we feel that those part make it too easy to pass some type of planets.
We may use such restrictions on later planets too.

Italian localisations is now available.

- NEW: Minimap on all courses
- NEW: Raised challenges attempts to 6
- NEW: 20 new challenges added
- NEW: rover parts characteristics menu improved
- NEW: player levels
- NEW: all planets are unlocked by player level
- NEW: challenge tiers are unlocked by player level
- NEW: event rover parts are now available in game shop
- NEW: new main menu
- NEW: planet leaderboards
- NEW: a lottery mini-game. Win rare rover parts!
- NEW: new currency - crystals
- NEW: a separate planet for starting rovercrafters
- Also some bugfixes. 

Do not forget to participate in in-game community and submit all your suggestions to in-game support (in Settings menu)
